I like to review data sets and reproduce easy to read and understand charting and graphics in R Markdown language. I also like to program Mobile Applications for Android using Java and have programmed numerous practical applications that are shown here.

I graduated from the [Victoria University](https://www.vu.edu.au/study-at-vu/courses/browse-for-courses/by-topic/business/enterprise-resource-planning-erp-systems) with a Masters in Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Systems in 2020. For this course, I attained a Course GPA of 6.167 and a Course WAM: 75.000 (Distinction Average).

I currently work at Transdev Melbourne as a Service Delivery Specialist in the Public Trasport Victoria network.

I was previously employed at Australia Post as a Credit Risk Manager, Procedures and Processes writer, SAP Fuctions across differet areas of the business including Finance, Inventory and Project Management.

I enjoy trainingin Martial Arts, travelling, cooking, time with my family and AFL (Australian) Football
